metadata.Title: CVE-2021-37819 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
PDF Labs pdftk-java v3.2.3 was discovered to contain an infinite loop via the component /text/pdf/PdfReader.java.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-37819` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pdftk-java - 3.3.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libitext-java package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
libitext5-java package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
pdftk-java package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.2-1').
